Rehabilitation Rates for Transition Age Youth

Transition age youth is an important population for VR agencies. The chart illustrates the average rehabilitation rate for transition age youth in each RSA disability category.

Rehabilitation rates are displayed for the following disability categories:

  • Visual
  • Hearing
  • Orthopedic
  • Intellectual
  • Substance Abuse
  • Mental Health
  • Learning
  • Traumatic Brain Injury
  • Other

Clicking on the legend will allow you to manipulate the chart to only see data relevant to your needs or interests.

Rehabilitation Rate of Transition Age Youth by Disability Category

Powered by Socrata

Sources: The 2011 National Survey of State Vocational Rehabilitation Agencies; RSA-911 FY2010
